name: Operation Blue
description:
Hello! This is my submission for Super Mega Jam (https://itch.io/jam/super-mega-jam-free-theme)

This is a souls like first person shooter with a low poly western/science fiction aesthetic. This is the second part of a short game jam series. The goal is to have the story line run  across all three episodes to slowly piece it all together.

I hope you all have fun! And please don't hesitate to give feedback!

http://corrafiniuminc.com/
